column5: 1年前と比べて、今の景気はどう変わりましたか。
column10: 『景況感・前年比』のご回答について、そのようにお考えになるのは、主にどのようなことからですか。【2つまでの複数回答】
column17: 現在の景気をどう感じますか。
column23: 1年後の景気は、今と比べてどうなると思いますか。
column28: 景気の状況を考えたとき、現在の金利水準をどのようにお考えになりますか。
column32: 1年前と比べて、あなたの暮らし向きがどう変わったと感じますか。
column37: （『暮らし向きの変化・前年比』で「ゆとりが出てきた」と答えた方へ）その理由は次のうちどれですか。【複数回答】
column45: （『暮らし向きの変化・前年比』で「ゆとりがなくなってきた」と答えた方へ）その理由は次のうちどれですか。【複数回答】
column53: 1年前と比べて、あなたの世帯の収入はどう変わりましたか。
column57: （『収入の変化・前年比』で「増えた」と答えた方へ）1年前と比べて、あなたの世帯の収入が変わった理由は何ですか。【複数回答】
column64: （『収入の変化・前年比』で「減った」と答えた方へ）1年前と比べて、あなたの世帯の収入が変わった理由は何ですか。【複数回答】
column71: 1年後のあなたの世帯の収入は、現在と比べてどうなると思いますか。
column75: （『1年後の収入の予想』で「増える」と答えた方へ）現在と比べて、1年後のあなたの世帯の収入が変わると考えた理由は何ですか。【複数回答】
column82: （『1年後の収入の予想』で「減る」と答えた方へ）現在と比べて、1年後のあなたの世帯の収入が変わると考えた理由は何ですか。【複数回答】
column89: 1年前と比べて、あなたの世帯の支出はどう変わりましたか。
column93: （『支出の変化・前年比』で「増えた」と答えた方へ）支出が増えたのはなぜですか。【複数回答】
column104: （『支出の変化・前年比』で「減った」と答えた方へ）支出が減ったのはなぜですか。【複数回答】
column112: 『支出の変化・前年比』のうち、あなたの世帯では、生活費や教育費などの日常的な支出をどうしていますか。
column116: 『支出の変化・前年比』のうち、あなたの世帯では、趣味やレジャーなど選択的な支出をどうしていますか。
column120: 今後1年間、あなたの世帯では支出をどうされますか。
column124: あなたの世帯が今後1年間の支出を考えるにあたって特に重視することは、次のうちどれですか。【複数回答】
column132: 今後1年間、商品やサービスを選ぶ際に特に重視することは、次のうちどれですか。【3つまでの複数回答】

column5: How do you think economic conditions have changed compared with one year ago?
column10: What makes you think that present economic conditions have either changed or remained the same compared with one year ago? (Up to two answers are allowed.)
column17: How would you describe the current economic conditions?
column23: What is your outlook for economic conditions one year from now?
column28: Considering the current economic conditions, what do you think of the current interest rate level?
column32: What do you think of your household circumstances compared with one year ago?
column37: For respondents who answered that their present household circumstances "have become better off" compared with one year ago, why do you think this is so? (Multiple answers are allowed.)
column45: For respondents who answered that their present household circumstances "have become worse off" compared with one year ago, why do you think this is so? (Multiple answers are allowed.)
column53: How has your household income changed compared with one year ago?
column57: For respondents who answered that their present household income "has increased" compared with one year ago, why is this so? (Multiple answers are allowed.)
column64: For respondents who answered that their present household income "has decreased" compared with one year ago, why is this so? (Multiple answers are allowed.)
column71: What is your outlook for household income one year from now?
column75: For respondents who answered that their household income "will increase" one year from now, why do you think this is so? (Multiple answers are allowed.)
column82: For respondents who answered that their household income "will decrease" one year from now, why do you think this is so? (Multiple answers are allowed.)
column89: How has your household changed its spending compared with one year ago?
column93: For respondents who answered that their household "has increased" its spending compared with one year ago, why has your household done so? (Multiple answers are allowed.)
column104: For respondents who answered that their household "has decreased" its spending compared with one year ago, why has your household done so? (Multiple answers are allowed.)
column112: How has your household changed its everyday spending such as on living and educational expenses compared with one year ago?
column116: How has your household changed its selective spending, such as on hobbies and leisure activities, compared with one year ago?
column120: How does your household plan to change its spending within the year ahead?
column124: Which of the following is/are the major factor(s) that your household will consider when making spending decisions for the year ahead? (Multiple answers are allowed.)
column132: Which of the following is/are the major factor(s) when choosing goods and services on which to spend for the year ahead? (Up to three answers are allowed.)

column1: （注1）第26回（2006年6月）は、訪問留置法での調査のほか、予備調査として郵送調査も実施。
（注2）現在の景況感D.I.＝「良くなった」−「悪くなった」。
（注3）1年後の景況感D.I.＝「良くなる」−「悪くなる」。
（注4）現在の暮らし向きD.I.＝「ゆとりが出てきた」−「ゆとりがなくなってきた」。
（注5）第94回（2023年6月）より「デザインが良い」・「流行のものである」・「今までにない新しいものである」・「好奇心が刺激される」・「ブランドイメージが良い」は調査の選択肢から削除。
（注6）第93回（2023年3月）までは「この中にはない」。

(Note 1) The economic conditions D.I. for the present compared with one year ago is calculated as the proportion of respondents who answered that economic conditions "have improved" minus the proportion of those who answered that they "have worsened."

(Note 2) The economic conditions D.I. for the outlook for one year from now is calculated as the proportion of respondents who answered that economic conditions "will improve" minus the proportion of those who answered that they "will worsen."

(Note 3) The household circumstances D.I. for the present compared with one year ago is calculated as the proportion of respondents who answered that their household circumstances "have become better off" minus the proportion of those who answered that they "have become worse off."
(Note 4) The following choices were discontinued from the 94th survey (June 2023): "design," "trend," "originality/innovation," "curiosity," and "brand reputation."
